text: @SpeakerPelosi Tell the truth Nancy. You and the #Democrats prioritized impeachment over #COVIDー19.  Of course, much more drama involved with impeachment! Huge distraction from any other news happening around the globe including the #CoronavirusPandemic. You will fail again. Fun to watch.😁
